name: Mimpi Dreams: Mars DLC
storyline:
This DLC extends your Mimpi Dreams with the latest level - Mars. This episode is enormous, larger than all of the previous levels combined. It is larger than the rest of the game. It is made of thousands of graphical assets, hundreds of sounds and it is the authors' tribute to Mimpi's comeback and effort to innovate and push the game's limits.

Story
The bad guy is using a volcano as a cannon to shoot down the stars!! What would be a night sky without them shining away? Mimpi embarks on a journey into the heart of the volcano to save the stars and find a way to get them home.

Puzzles
Mars features a record portion of challenges. Mimpi will again need your skills to overcome them. But it won't be easy. There are no hint balloons.

Features
larger than the rest of the game, it's almost like Mimpi Dreams 2
enhanced gameplay, new puzzles
new story, new animated characters
thousands of graphical assets
hundreds of new sounds

About Mimpi
Mimpi is a lazy doggy who likes to sleep a lot. In his dreams, he becomes the dog hero, who rescues and saves whoever is in need of rescuing or saving! Be it a lost pirate ship, a lab rat who wants to be free or a princess held by a dragon - Mimpi hero is here to save the day. Of course, Mimpi cannot do it without his sidekick and that is YOU!

Mimpi and you are the makers of his dreams. Help Mimpi be the hero by manipulating his dreams - move obstacles to allow Mimpi to get through levels, solve puzzles and help Mimpi communicate with the creatures in his dreams.
summary: What would be the night sky without shining stars? Mimpi explores the famous Red Planet and investigates the mystery of their disappearance. This new level is almost as large as all previous levels together.
